sn1.13:0.3: None Equal to That for a Son
sn1.13:1.2: Standing to one side, that devatā spoke this verse in the presence of the Blessed One:
sn1.13:2.1: “There is no affection like that for a son,
sn1.13:2.3: There is no light like the sun,
sn1.13:2.4: Among the waters the ocean is supreme. ”
sn1.13:3.1: “There is no affection like that for oneself,
sn1.13:3.3: There is no light like wisdom,
sn1.13:3.4: Among the waters the rain is supreme. ”
